item.description:
Come have fun with BUNKO! Lots of fun and laughter with this dice game. There will be cash prizes! And for everyone that is still looking for that perfect gift we will have a SOUTHERN LIVING COORDINATOR there in the beginning with some samples of beautiful gifts that can be ordered.[6:30-7:30] www.southernlivingathome.com/joanie Bring a small munchie and whatever your drinking!

If you have never had the opportunity to play this game you are in for a real treat! One of our members Denise will show us how to play. Nothing but a good time. No experience necessary.

Another meetup group will be joining us so we'll have lots of people and fun!
item.name: BUNKO NIGHT
